markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skillful Tail (Ganzi)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2538) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 96 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a tail or similar body part that is always willing to lend a hand (so to speak). You can perform simple Interact actions with your tail, such as opening an unlocked door. Your tail can't perform actions that require fingers or significant manual dexterity, including any action that would require a check to accomplish, and you can't use it to hold items.

<title level="2">Skillful Tail (Ganzi) leads to...</title>
[Larcenous Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=2541), [Mischievous Tail](/Feats.aspx?ID=2544)
name: Skillful Tail (Ganzi)
